name: Flumbus Glumpus!
description:
This is a game about a blob (or slime) named Flumbus Glumpus. 

Flumbus Glumpus wants to fly through pipes on his flying broom without hitting them. Help him to do this!

If you find bugs or anything, write it down in the comments section!

Game features:

  • Customisable obstacles, player and background
  • Multiple difficulties
  • Playtime counter

Note: This game only supports Android 9 or higher
